mapper.insert: insert into oms_new_order_info_json ( id, json_data, sent_flag, creater, created, modifier, modified ) value ( #{id}, #{jsonData}, 0, 'wsdl', now(), 'wsdl', now() )
insert into oms_changed_order_info_json ( id, json_data, sent_flag, creater, created, modifier, modified ) value ( #{id}, #{jsonData}, 0, 'wsdl', now(), 'wsdl', now() )
